mapper.insert: insert into FT_File (ID, NAME, FOLDER_ID, FILE_EXTEND_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_DOWNLOAD_CISHU, FILE_MD5, FILE_VERSION, IS_RECYCLE, FILE_URL, VIEW_AUTH_USERS, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS, COLLECT_USER, SHARE_CODE, SHARE_PASD, SHARE_TYPE, SHARE_DUE_DATE, ISYL, REMARK, YL_URL, YL_CODE, YL_PATH, YL_COUNT, TB_STATUS, TOTAL_TIME, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileExtendName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileDownloadCishu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isRecycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sharePasd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareDueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ylUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ylCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ylPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ylCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update FT_File set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOLDER_ID = #{folderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILE_EXTEND_NAME = #{fileExtendName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_DOWNLOAD_CISHU = #{fileDownloadCishu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FILE_MD5 = #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_VERSION = #{fileVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_RECYCLE = #{isRecycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_URL = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIEW_AUTH_USERS = #{viewAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS = #{downloadAuthUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLLECT_USER = #{collectUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_CODE = #{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_PASD = #{sharePasd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_TYPE = #{shareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_DUE_DATE = #{shareDueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ISYL = #{isyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YL_URL = #{ylUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YL_CODE = #{ylCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YL_PATH = #{ylPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YL_COUNT = #{ylCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_STATUS = #{tbStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_TIME = #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, UP_USER = #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_DATE = #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CR_USER = #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_DATE = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, FOLDER_ID, FILE_EXTEND_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_DOWNLOAD_CISHU, FILE_MD5, FILE_VERSION, IS_RECYCLE, FILE_URL, VIEW_AUTH_USERS, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS, COLLECT_USER, SHARE_CODE, SHARE_PASD, SHARE_TYPE, SHARE_DUE_DATE, ISYL, REMARK, YL_URL, YL_CODE, YL_PATH, YL_COUNT, TB_STATUS, TOTAL_TIME, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from FT_File where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ID, NAME, FOLDER_ID, FILE_EXTEND_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_DOWNLOAD_CISHU, FILE_MD5, FILE_VERSION, IS_RECYCLE, FILE_URL, VIEW_AUTH_USERS, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS, COLLECT_USER, SHARE_CODE, SHARE_PASD, SHARE_TYPE, SHARE_DUE_DATE, ISYL, REMARK, YL_URL, YL_CODE, YL_PATH, YL_COUNT, TB_STATUS, TOTAL_TIME, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from FT_File
